name: g_Audioso
description:
A basic rhythm game that uses 8 keys. Use WASD and the arrow buttons to hit the note in time with the music! 4 tracks to choose from!

Made for Rhythm Jam 2021. I think something went wrong with the export process and the rhythm got desynced. Yes, I know I'm playing the "but it worked fine on my computer" card. At least the first song should be able to be played correctly.
